reviewText:
Very informative and comprehensive review on the topic of sexual intimacy for the baby boomers. A group of men and women in their 60s-70s discuss their problems and concerns about relationships, sexuality, physical limitations, and psychological inhibitions. Dr. Sugrue answers their questions and provides good education. I've learned a lot from this video.
The DVD can be watched in segments. It has nice graphics and is well directed. I would highly recommend it to all boomers who are still interested in sex.
Insightful information,fascinating discussions about Sex Over sixty. Makes it all exciting again,I will recommend it to my friends
